name: SquareWar2D
description:
SquareWar2D is a 2D Shooter, where you the triangle have to fight against the squares, which are attacking you.

You can show them in 3 different gamemodes that you are better than the squares:

The Challenges:

A challenge where weak enemies (squares) are just spawning without a break, for example.

The Normalmode:

An easy to learn basic gamemode, where the enemies just spawn in normal speed.

The Bossmode:

The Bossmode contains a few bosses which spawn after a certain amount of kills.


You can even unlock cosmetics, at the moment only colours for your triangle.
